title: Introduction to Testing
content: Testing is the process of evaluating software to ensure it meets requirements and is free of defects.
questions: Why is testing important in software development?

title: Unit Testing
content: Unit testing involves testing individual components or functions of an application in isolation.
questions: Name popular unit testing frameworks for JavaScript.

title: Integration Testing
content: Integration testing checks how different modules or services interact together.
questions: Difference between unit and integration testing?
When should integration testing be performed?

title: End-to-End Testing
content: End-to-end testing verifies the entire application flow, simulating real user scenarios.
questions: Give examples of tools used for E2E testing.

title: Testing Best Practices
content: Best practices include writing clear test cases, maintaining test data, and automating repetitive tests.
